item.title: About Me
item.description: This is meDavy van de Laar Consultant strong focus on cloudnative and SDDC www.itq.eu My Story I have been working in IT as long as I can remember and I can truly say that I have always loved it! The world around us is always moving, always changing and I do embrace that. It is one of those things that makes the IT world so attractive and so much fun.

item.title: Navigating Kubecon 2023 Like a Newbie
item.description: This year the KubeCon + CloudNativeCon 2023 event took place in the RAI Amsterdam. With 10k+ tickets sold the event was completely sold out. For me and for over 5000 (!) other attendees this was the first in person visit to KubeCon + CloudNativeCon ever. To me this underlines the importance of cloudnative and it’s eco-system. Also, enough material and impressions to write an article on ‘Navigating Kubecon 2023 Like a Newbie’.
